data.title: Help me identify this Christmas song I heard on the radio!!
data.meta_description: Ok big news!! Finally heard the song again on easyrock today at work! Unfortunately I only caught a little bit!! It goes "something something
data.text:
shadowfighta [OP]

Deal Addict

1447 posts

3 upvotes

Ok big news!! Finally heard the song again on easyrock today at work! Unfortunately I only caught a little bit!!

It goes "something something brand new start. Merry Chriiiiiiiiistmaaaaaaaaas, awooooooooooooooooooooooooooo"

northernstar

Jr. Member

154 posts

14 upvotes

I thought it might be this, but the lyrics are different than the ones you posted.

Aselin Debison - As Long As There's Christmas.

http://www.celinedion.com/cgi-bin/Canad ... mas_lo.wma

EZ Rock does have a list of the Christmas music that they are playing. I don't know if it is complete, but here it is anyways.

http://www.ezrock.com/content/content_i ... edule.asp#

Choose "Vote here for your favorite holiday hits" on the left side of the page to get the playlist.

shadowfighta [OP]

Deal Addict

1447 posts

3 upvotes

Arggg finally heard the song today but couldn't hear the name too well. I'm pretty sure the name of the song is "Merry Christmas" but I missed the artist. I heard "backva" or something similar.

shadowfighta [OP]

Deal Addict

1447 posts

3 upvotes

These are the lyrics before the chorus:

May this Christmas bring you light into your soul,

May the love of Jesus make you whole,

May the gift of goodness --------------------,

--------------- brand new start,

Merry Christmaaaaaaaaaaaas, ahhh wooooooooooo

The song is called Merry Christmas but I don't know the artist. "Nabackvah" or something similar sounding.

groo wrote:It's the christmas one, with male vocals. Actually, I believe it's bell wireless. The latest commercial has a "pay it forward" theme, but all of the commercials have the same song (albeit different parts of the song)

The song is "I Believe in Father Christmas" by Emerson, Lake & Palmer... vocals by Greg Lake

AMDr wrote:The song is "I Believe in Father Christmas" by Emerson, Lake & Palmer... vocals by Greg Lake

Woohoo, that's it Thanks.

After looking at the lyrics, it seems more like an anti-christmas song... heh, oh well, still sounds cool
